molgenis.name: ngs
molgenis.label: Next Generation Sequencing Workbench
molgenis.description: Simple workbench to work with Illumina NGS data. Samples are delivered as part of Investigations, optionally registering the contacts for this investigation. Within an NGS facility these samples will be processed into libraries. These libraries will subsequently be measured on the illumina flowcell, each library into one lane. Along the way a lot of 'Features' will be measured that result in ObservedValues that need to be attached to samples, libraries, or lanes respectively. This user interface provides a minimal way to do this.
